TopicTitle: List of mods that work Flawlessly with 1.0

Articles.Content: As plenty of us have noticed some of the mods that we may have had previously installed in ksp have gone haywire, are there any mods that work flawlessly? and are there any new mods made for 1.0?

We also have a thread here on the forums, moderator-maintained: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116916-Comprehensive-Mod-Compatibility-List-for-KSP-1-0](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116916-Comprehensive-Mod-Compatibility-List-for-KSP-1-0)
Please take the discussion to that thread, as this one is in the wrong subforum.
